list.text: Wedding coordinator’s support
Solemn marriage registration by a specialist of the Department of State Registration
A ceremony without guests (up to 30 min)
Modern music score
The cost of marriage registration on Tuesday and Wednesday 10:00 am - 5:00 pm (on Tuesday till 7:00 pm)
Wedding coordinator’s support
Solemn marriage registration by a specialist of the Department of State Registration
Preliminary booking of the date and time of the event
The ceremony including guests (up to 30 min/15 guests)
Marriage certificate front cover
Gift bouquet of flowers
Modern music score
The cost of marriage registration on Tuesday-Saturday 10:00 am - 5:00 pm (on Tuesday till 7:00 pm, on Saturday till 3:00 pm)
Wedding coordinator’s support
Solemn marriage registration by specialist of the Department of State Registration
Preliminary booking of the date and time of the event
The ceremony including guests (to 1 hour/ 30 guests)
Marriage certificate front cover
Gift bouquet of flowers
Modern music score
Preliminary consultation with the wedding ceremony coordinator
Marriage registration on the day of application

list.name: Marriage registration after hours
list.text: services are provided when it is technically possible
Only for packages "Standard" and "Premium"
On Thursday - Friday 5:00 pm - 7:00 pm
On Saturday 3:00 pm - 6:00 pm
On Sunday and Monday 10:00 am - 6:00 pm
Registration of marriage on state holidays  + 3 596,6 UAH (only with the package "Premium")

Apostille (certificates of marriage, birth, death, divorce, change of name, surname, extract from the Department of State Registration, court decisions, court certificates) - non-urgent 411 UAH, urgent 510 UAH (indicated cost does not include bank commission)
Simultaneous interpretation of the wedding ceremony (the value depends on language) – of 600 UAH. (indicated cost does not include bank commission)
Individual wedding ceremony “LOVE STORY” costs 2400 UAH (indicated cost does not include bank commission)
If the newlyweds (or one of them) are not citizens of Ukraine, they will additionally pay 2000 UAH for all packages and services
Registration of marriage on the day of application costs  extra 2000 UAH (service is provided only when it is technically possible to)
The indicated value does not include the bank charges
